scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:shell" "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:clients" "npm run dev:design"
scripts.dev:mfe: concurrently "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:clients" "npm run dev:shell"
scripts.dev:fed: concurrently "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:clients" "npm run dev:design" "sleep 3 && npm run dev:shell"
scripts.start:mfe: concurrently "npm run preview:auth" "npm run preview:clients" "npm run preview:design" "sleep 8 && npm run dev:shell"
scripts.build:dev:auth: npm run build --workspace=packages/auth-mfe && npm run preview --workspace=packages/auth-mfe
scripts.build:dev:clients: npm run build --workspace=packages/clients-mfe && npm run preview --workspace=packages/clients-mfe
scripts.build:dev:design: npm run build --workspace=packages/design-system && npm run preview --workspace=packages/design-system
scripts.preview:auth: npm run build --workspace=packages/auth-mfe && npm run preview --workspace=packages/auth-mfe
scripts.preview:clients: npm run build --workspace=packages/clients-mfe && npm run preview --workspace=packages/clients-mfe
scripts.preview:design: npm run build --workspace=packages/design-system && npm run preview --workspace=packages/design-system
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
